I am using the latest download and 2012 express and when I include the binaries from the NuGet package, everything works fine.

I want to tweak a couple of things in the header, and when I try and reference the built project locally, I get designer having problems finding and loading the other DLL referenced in the binaries.

Have you come across this before?
What do you mean with 'reference the built project locally'? Do you have error details?
